snippet.title: LEGO Orient Expedition: The Quest For The Golden Dragon (2003 online) walkthrough
snippet.description:
The second of two games based on the Orient Expedition sub-theme of LEGO Adventurers, hosted on LEGO.com in 2003. Johnny Thunder and friends have arrived at the location of the golden dragon, but first they must collect the three golden objects to adorn the guardian with, even though in the story the sword and shield were already respectively recovered from a temple somewhere in India and a temple in the Himalayas.

Since the layout of the maze is different between easy and hard difficulties, this video shows both; Easy mode begins at 1:39, Hard mode begins at 6:49. The rotation puzzle is identical between difficulties.

Developed by the apparently now-defunct Titoonic.

Downloaded from Biomedia's Project Brick: http://biomediaproject.com/bmp/lmp/

Play online (requires Shockwave): http://biomediaproject.com/bmp/files/LEGO/gms/online/Adventurers/TheQuestForTheGoldenDragon/
Download: http://biomediaproject.com/bmp/files/LEGO/gms/download/Adventurers/TheQuestForTheGoldenDragon.zip
